Articles.Content:
Version 23.5 or below is allowed! Im new, sorry if this shouldn't be here.

Basically, it will be a conflict between 6 nations.

Nations: 5 volunteers are needed to command nations. You can pick a planet from the Kerban Solar system. (Note: If you pick jool, you will need to create either a space station or an artificial gravity platform by using docking systems and SAS) You also get to choose the nation name. (For example, my nation is called "United Kerban Empire", stationed on an island east of the launchpad on kerban(nobody else can be on kerban))

Ships: I will not accept any ships with mods. You will have to build your own. UKE will build ships for a price, however we are not responsible for refueling your ships after their arrival.

How to command: You will need a Steam Account or PM me on roblox. You will send me a list of things you want done. The first person to go will set how long each nation gets per day. The first person will rotate each day. (for example, UKE goes first and takes 1 hour 11 minutes, everybody else gets that much time to complete their tasks. Long tasks = Lower chance of it being done) At the end of all turns, you will receive a status update on solar system diplomacy and actions regarding you.

Diplomacy: Diplomacy is available as long as you have a satellite or willing to risk going into other people's territory.

Territories: If you own a planet, you do not own the moon! Your territorial boundaries begin at 500,000 altitude. If anything crosses over that 500,000 mark, any defense systems will attack it unless it is unarmed. (sights can be deceiving)

How to tell ships apart: When signing up your nation, please choose whether you want a tag such as [uKE] on your ships, or if you want it to be colored.

Communications: Communications can only be used if you and the other player have some way of radio (satellite, mobile satellite, space station)

If you want to join this, fill out this bit below and >PM< it to me >OR Post it below<

Also, be sure to remove ANYTHING in parentheses.

-----------------

Nation Name: (example: United Kerban Empire)

Hostility: (Hostile, Friendly, Neutral)

Planet: (such as the Mun; Sun not allowed)

Starting Satellite: (Yes or No)

Starting Control Tower: (Yes or No)

Tag: (Yes or No(See How to tell ships apart))

Color: (Yes(insert color) or No)

Way of command: (Steam or Other(List Other)

-----------------
Thread based on an almost identical premice and a Shameless plug
